name: Triumph Group, Inc.
description: Triumph Group, Inc. is a global leader in the aerospace and defense industry, specializing in the design, manufacture, repair, and overhaul of aircraft components and systems. Founded in 1993 and headquartered in Berwyn, Pennsylvania, Triumph serves a diverse range of customers, including commercial, regional, and military aircraft manufacturers and operators. The company operates through various segments, including Triumph Aerospace Services, Triumph Integrated Systems, and Triumph Structures. Triumph is dedicated to delivering high-quality products and services that enhance the performance and reliability of aircraft while ensuring the highest safety standards. With a focus on innovation, Triumph invests in advanced manufacturing technologies and processes, such as additive manufacturing and digital engineering, to meet the evolving needs of the aerospace market. The company is committed to sustainability through efficient operations and the development of eco-friendly products. Triumph’s mission is to support the aerospace industry in achieving its goals, leveraging its extensive expertise and capabilities to deliver exceptional value to its customers.
